title: SIGNS FOR JUNCTION BOXES CONTAINING PV D.C. CABLE TERMINATIONS
fullText:
A warning label containing the warning symbol and stating the following shall be attached to junction boxes housing the terminations of PV d.c. cable:

WARNING: HAZARDOUS d.c. VOLTAGE

NOTE 1 See Figure A.2.

NOTE 2 This does not apply to PV array disconnecting devices as they have their own labelling requirements (see Clause 5.5.2).
